mapper.select: select t1.keyid , t1.datatime , t1.name , t1.cidorcode , t1.court , t1.casenum , t1.statute , t1.money , t1.putrecord , t1.objection , t1.objectiontime , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.fk_id from ext_law_company_exe t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_law_company_exe t1 set t1.keyid =#{dto.keyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.datatime =#{dto.datatime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.name =#{dto.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.cidorcode =#{dto.cidorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.court =#{dto.court,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.casenum =#{dto.casenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.statute =#{dto.statute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.money =#{dto.money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.putrecord =#{dto.putrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.objection =#{dto.objection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.objectiontime =#{dto.objectiontime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.fk_id =#{dto.fkId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_law_company_exe t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_law_company_exe t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
